subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Chris Heisey hit a grand slam during the Dodgers’ six-run fifth inning, and host Los Angeles trimmed its magic number to four for the National League West crown and a postseason berth with a 6-3 victory over the Arizona Diamondbacks on Thursday.
snippet: Chris Heisey hit a grand slam during the Dodgers’ six-run fifth inning, and host Los Angeles trimmed its magic number to four for the National League West crown and a postseason berth with a 6-3 victory over the Arizona Diamondbacks on Thursday.
